name: Curious George [GBA]
description:
Curious George is an arcade game developed by Torus Games and Monkey Bar Games. It came out on 01-02-2006. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Curious George on PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance, Xbox and GameCube.
It was produced by Universal Pictures.
